abstract: John A. Mattera, 50, a Florida-based investment manager, was arrested Thursday on charges of running an $11 million, two-year fraud that falsely promised investors access to coveted shares of Groupon, Facebook and other private companies.

headline.main: Manager Who Claimed to Own Facebook Shares Charged With Fraud
